QuickstartÂ¶

  1. Add dappr to your urlpatterns:
from dappr import urls

urlpatterns = [
        ...
        url(r'^registration/', include(urls)),
]
  1. Create a link to dappr’s registration view
...(some template)...
<a href="{% url 'registration_view' %}">Create an account</a>
